entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness this evening then periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 10 February 2023
